description: In this special one-shot, superstar artist Ben Templesmith tackles his first full Doctor Who project, alongside writers Moore and Reppion. In 'The Whispering Gallery', the TARDIS lands in a maze-like gallery filled with thousands of talking pictures, and the Doctor and Martha discover they've come across a planet where showing emotion has been outlawed. The inhabitants have good reason for their supression, but it wouldn't be like the Doctor to leave theim in fear of truly living.
name: Through Time and Space Part 1: The Whispering Gallery

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description: The Time Machination: London, 1889 and a time-stranded Doctor needs the help of an old friend to fix the TARDIS… but is beset by pursuers sent by Queen Victoria herself! How is this connected to a previous tale of the Sixth Doctor and a Fourth Doctor adventure that hasn't happened yet? And what will happened if the Doctor is captured by the Torchwood Institute? Tony Lee and Paul Grist tell this special standalone tale.
name: Through Time and Space Part 2: The Time Machination

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description: Autopia: An all-American creative team tackles the celebrated Doctor in this special standalone tale. John Ostrander (Star Wars: Legacy) writes and Kelly Yates (Doctor Who: The Forgotten) illustrates an adventure where the Doctor and his companion Donna arrive on a utopian planet where robots do all the manual labor. But things aren't quite what they seem…
name: Through Time and Space Part 3: Autopia

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description: Black Death White Lies: After the Doctor and his companion Martha mistakingly land the TARDIS during the Great Plague of London, the discovery of a healer draws them into a mystery that could mean the end of Martha!
name: Through Time and Space Part 4: Black Death White Life

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description: Room With A Deja View: The Doctor, travelling alone, lands at the scene of a murder on a space station in the middle of deep space. He must use every ounce of his incredible mind to discover the truth from the sole suspect, whose species lives against the natural flow of time. Writer Rich Johnston (Whatmensch) and artist Eric J (Rex Mundi) bring you this mind-twisting tale.
name: Through Time and Space Part 5: Room With A Déjà View

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description: Cold Blooded War!: In this standalone tale, the Doctor and Donna attempt to broker a peace plan between two very hierarchical and pompous alien races, the Draconians and Ice Warriors. But their best efforts are derailed by someone who stands to gain from the continued conflict. Written by TV show editor Gary Russell, with art by Adrian Salmon.
name: Through Time and Space Part 6: Cold-Blooded War

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Tenth Doctor Archives

description:
HER HEART’S BEEN BROKEN INTO SEVEN PIECES, AND SHE’LL DO ANYTHING TO GET THEM BACK!

When the Man With No Name breaks Emma’s heart, she wants to die. But you never die from these things; you just want to. In a moment of weakness, she wishes her broken heart away and a mysterious stranger—who may or may not be totally evil—obliges. But emptiness is even worse than grief, and when Emma learns that her heart can be regained piece by piece, she takes a strange bargain. But will the cost of her heart be her soul?

Free first issue in the fantastical digital-first series!

From the red-hot team of Kelly Thompson (Captain Marvel and the Carol Corp, Jem and the Holograms) and Meredith McClaren (Hinges, Hopeless Savages)!

For fans of Scott Pilgrim!

A fresh, funny, and action-packed take on heartbreak!

Having regained the first piece of her missing heart, Emma sets out to collect the remaining pieces spread across the country, a journey that takes a surprisingly violent turn in an underground brothel!

Writer Kelly Thompson (Captain Marvel and the Carol Corp, Jem and the Holograms) rips out readers’ hearts!

Artist Meredith McClaren (Hinges, Hopeless Savages) puts them back together!

For fans of Scott Pilgrim!

A fresh, funny, and action-packed take on heartbreak!

'I'm going to make the front cover of a glossy magazine one of these days, I swear it!'

Kelly Mason has big dreams of the big break that will take her to the top in the glamour game. And with handsome, worldwise Lorenzo Lupo to push her, she's about to make that breakthrough she's always dreamed of.

But to get ahead, what will Kelly have to leave behind? And what if her career isn't the only thing being pushed?

Sometimes a dream come true can become a nightmare in the making!
name: No More The Fool

description:
'My face, Rachel! Someone threw acid at my face!'

Rachel Norman and Alison King had started out in the world of modelling together. And both knew that to get to the top you needed to have something special. That special something Alison had was cunning and determination to get ahead... whatever the cost!

Now, with a top photographer for a boyfriend and an international career taking her higher and higher, Alison is about to discover that there are others even more cunning and determined around...

...And that maybe the cost of her success is a price too high to pay!
name: Treacherous Heart

description:
'I told him not to drive too fast! I told him!'

From blushing bride to grieving widow within weeks?

When Julie Denton met wealthy David Stockland she couldn't have guessed that their whirlwind romance would quickly lead to the altar... and then to the graveside! A roaring engine and a screech of brakes on a deserted road signal the tragic accident that leaves Julie alone again.

Or is she quite alone? Not with Ken Peyton, the rugged Estate Manager, to help her cope.

But was it really a tragic accident? Charles Brandon, dogged insurance investigator, suspects not. And his suspicions fall directly upon Julie and Ken!
name: Till Death Us Do Part

description:
'I know he kissed me and said he loved me! But that was only because we were both frightened...'

Sally Rawlings had never even heard of Warina Island when the letter arrived from old boyfriend, Howard Morgan, offering her a new job and a new start in this South Pacific paradise.

Is this also a second chance for romance with her old flame? Or will new passions flare when the island's rugged boat skipper, Sam Burton, sails into her life?

One thing's for certain, with Howard's wildcat sister Maria around, there will be tropical storms in paradise before Sally even finds her feet!
name: Bitter Paradise

description:
'To you, Katie, a most beautiful girl!'

'And a hard-working one…'

…And Katie Miller was prepared to work as hard as it took to realise her dream of one day owning her own catering business. Then, while waitressing at a glitzy party she met the man who could make her dreams a reality - and his handsome son who might have been a dream come true himself!

It seemed like a Cinderella story, but each fairy-tale needs a Prince Charming, and Katie was to learn that not all princes are quite as charming as they may seem!
name: Hopeless Heart

description:
'So Liz has finally got herself a boyfriend. Somewhat rough and rustic, my dear, but I'm sure he'll suit you admirably.'

Poised, graceful, fussy Corrie and practical, hard-working, friendly Liz have so little in common that it would be hard to believe they could be sisters. But sisters they are, and when their parents moved to the Scottish Highlands to open a hotel, the squabbling siblings had no choice but to come along for the ride.

In no time at all encounters with straight-talking handyman Calum and sensitive, aristocratic Tim show the sisters they might just have something in common after all!

But will the matches they make bring them closer together... or drive Corrie and Liz even further apart?
name: Two Hearts

description:
Judge Dredd // Breaking Bud (Part: 4)

Mega-City One, 2137 AD. Home to 50 million citizens, this urban hell is situated along the east coast of post-apocalyptic North America, where crime is rampant. Tensions run a constant knife-edge and only the zero-tolerance Judges — empowered to dispense instant justice — can stop total anarchy. Toughest of them all is JUDGE DREDD — he is the Law! Now, former lab assistant Bud Biggard has stolen a highly powerful bracelet...

Sláine // Primordial (Part: 9)

Albion, in a time of myth and legend. Celtic barbarian warrior SLÁINE united the tribes of the Earth Goddess Danu and became the first High King of Ireland. After ruling for seven years, he travelled through time to fight for the Goddess in other eras before returning to save his people from the Fomorian sea devils. He then became a wanderer, serving the Goddess where she directs him, and now he’s battling the Drune Lords...

Tharg's Future Shocks // The Big Heist (Part: 1)

Out in the vast reaches of the universe, there are an infinite number of stories waiting to be told. From chronicles of the lowliest swamp denizens in backwater galaxies to the rise and fall of rulers of entire star systems, anything is possible in these twisted tales. Abandon your preconceptions, expect the unexpected and take a trip beyond the edges of the imagination…

Tharg's 3rillers Present // Commercial Break (Part: 2)

Three episodes, one complete, self-contained story — a condensed hit of super-charged Thrill-power beamed to you directly from the Nerve Centre! The Lake District, summer 1997. Daisy Chan, Annie Oakley and Leo McKinstry are three friends hanging out in the small town of Osterpool, where nothing very much happens. But when an unusual commercial appears on TV one July evening, they can’t get it out of their heads...

Strontium Dog // The Stix Fix (Part: 9)

Late 22nd century. After the Atomic Wars, many survivors were warped by the Strontium 90 fallout. These ‘mutants’ became a victimised underclass, forced into ghettos, and the only career open to them was bounty hunting. One such Search/Destroy agent, or STRONTIUM DOG, is Johnny Alpha, who was thought killed. Now, following a mutant rebellion, he’s been offered a job that will see him released from prison...
name: Prog 1932

description: Alaric Moebius and Basil Fox had no idea what they were in store for when they accepted an invitation by the mysterious “Collector,” a billionaire with a mysterious with a taste for rare and valuable supernatural objects of the occult. Now they find themselves racing through the labyrinthine corridors of an ancient castle, battling vengeaful ghosts and otherworldly entities with very little patience! Part two of the two-part "Bloodstone Caper" brought to you by Ryan Schifrin and co-written by the legendary Larry Hama (G.I. Joe, Wolverine)!

Hold On

HOLD ON inspired by Tom Waits's song of the same name.

Girls like Trina learn one thing early and often: everyone leaves. She's seen more than her fair share of taillights speeding west and out of her life forever. But sometimes being left behind is the only way to find what's worth staying for. (Silent)

ANGEL WITH A BULLET is a 4-part series of short comic stories, each inspired by a song from American music legend, Tom Waits.
name: Hold On

description:
They Call It Helltown

Turn On, Tune In, Drop Dead!

Apama just saved the city so he's probably earned a little time off, right? Not a chance.

Instead our 'Mane Man' discovers that the urban legend of Helltown is a lot more than just a good campfire spook story. There's a certain psycho-delic mistress of mayhem that will ensure Apama's stay there will be nasty, short, snd brutish (not-to-mention groovy beyond compare).

It's the monumental debut of the brown-n-tan avenger's arch-nemesis - a 'first appearance' that may be Apama's last!

Regina may have started out as a 1960s flowerchild, but make no mistake about it - This ain't no Summer of Love!
name: They Call It Helltown

description:
Between a Rock and Hard Place

After the run in with the mysterious Teffs downtown, Silverline has been on high alert chasing down anyone with powers who steps out of line. Alex grapples with the actions of his team as Silverline's lead suspect decides to turn to the tables.
name: Between A Rock and Hard Place

description:
Sands of Truth

Chapter 10 of Avaiyo, Vol. 01

After centuries of slavery under the oppressive rule of the Tamiran Empire, the people of Xiltria could no longer bear such anguish. Through immeasurable losses and hardships, these suffering victims were finally able to win back their lands. By forming militias and unifying all slaves together under one flag they were eventually able to crush the Tamiran Empire who had conquered the world so long ago. The people now had a fresh start in life. With their new "free world" they finally have a chance to get what they've wanted from the very start...peace.

Their dreams have been realized. Regions. Countries. Nations have been restored to their former glory. All of Xiltria now works together. With their continued efforts to reshape the world it is a time of prosperity. However, the seeds of evil have endured. In the underbelly of society, subtle remnants of the exiled Tamiran Empire still live on...and are starting to give way towards a new threat.

It's been nearly eight years since the citizens of Xiltria regained their freedom. Sekken, a young man who lived through the carnage, travels the world in an attempt to suppress any threats that could endanger this new "free world."
name: Sands of Truth

description: Outgunned and outmanned, Batman finds himself at the mercy of Bane and his new army!
name: Bane of Existence Part 2 of 5

description: Batman goes undercover as a deceased convict in order to track down the mastermind behind the Robbery Contest.
name: The Robbery Contest! Part 2 of 2

description: In these stories from LEGENDS OF THE DARK KNIGHT 100-PAGE SUPER SPECTACULAR #2-3, Batman battles The Riddler and Clayface. Plus, young Bruce Wayne discovers a cave that will affect his entire life.
name: Volume 4

volume.name: Batman: Legends Of The Dark Knight

description: The effects of war take their toll on Mack.
name: Vol. 2

description:
Introduced by your host, The Bloke, a Victorian undertaker, who I dress as at conventions to promote the magazine. Bloke's Terrible Tomb of Terror is a homage to the classic horror anthology magazines that we grew up loving.

This is an ongoing, self-published series, with eleven issues currently available and two collected editions. Voted Best Anthology Of 2013 in the Ghastly Awards.

Writers - Jason 'The Bloke' Crawley, Mike Hoffman Artwork - Mike Hoffman, Juan Carlos Abraldes Rendo, Nik Poliwko & Rob Moran.

Unwrapped

In this final issue of the current miniseries, Echo and Chance meet again. Pete intervenes to protect the teens of Brittleville, but does he know what he's dealing with? Nyx, Echo, Drake and Chance are unwrapping some very interesting secrets!
name: Unwrapped

description: The second issue of the FREE "magazine" of Caliber Rounds profiling Caliber's creators and titles. In this issue, we take a look at Caliber's war comics plus interviews with Wayne Vansant and Don Lomax. Also, a profile on the Sin Eternal series, which is a modern updating of Dante's Inferno. Tony Miello starts off his regular Gapo the Clown all new feature and for our bonus this issue, we have a very early tale of Deadworld in Gideon's: Guns for Sale.

There are two great adventures in the 12th issue of Champions Adventures. First, enjoy a classic tale of the Huntsman as he teams up with the League of Champions to take on the menace of Doctor Demonic and the League of Enemies.

Then, discover the secrets of the one true daughter of the dread lord Azsum-Gandi in "The Mystery of Sylph."
Cleopatra's space adventure in the REALLY far future continues!
name: Book Two: The Thief and the Sword

description: While everyone else battles with monsters, Arthur and Sam try to convince Alex of a plan that benefits the entire House, but that leaves Alex completely vulnerable to Devi's revenge. Just as Alex is about to dismiss the plan outright, Arthur makes a bargain that may prove too tempting. This issue delivers a satisfying end to a self-contained story arch that has been gathering praise among critics, pros and readers alike. Not to be missed!

Under contract with A.I.M., Deadpool ventures into the Savage Land to obtain the ultimate biological weapon: his own dang head! Yup, Zombie Deadpool's decapitated head makes its glorious return, and he's tired of being carried around everywhere. Deadpool will have to keep his own head on straight if he hopes to survive these Savage Land shenanigans and collect his bounty. Then, as if the zombie thing wasn't enough, it's alternate-universe mayhem as Deadpool encounters a multitude of malevolent mirror images: S.H.I.E.L.D Major Wilson, Wanda Wilson and the Deadpool Kid! But what happens when Deadpool, A.I.M. agents and his foxy new ladylove travel into the Marvel Zombieverse to try to return "Headpool" home? Plus: an extended look at the life and loves of Wanda Wilson, the maniacal Lady Deadpool!

Collects Deadpool: Merc With a Mouth #1-13, Lady Deadpool #1.
name: Volume 11: Merc With A Mouth

description:
The drone operators find themselves ambushed at sea by an unexpected foe - enemy drones! With nowhere to run and only one surviving robot to defend them, rookie David Weaver is their only hope of survival. No pressure!

Note: The digital edition (5/27/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

A-Demon-inbetween-the-seven-hills #3 (of 4)

Seyfettin Efendi is ordered to establish an organization to solve mysterious events. Their first case is to investigate a killer who slaughtered female victims and drank their blood in various parts of Istanbul. A secret organization also helps the killer.
name: A Demon Inbetween the Seven Hills Part 3

volume.name: The Exceptional Adventures Of Seyfettin Efendi

description: The Risen - Chapter 2: Something unnatural stirs in the darkness; an evil that the town of Cornerstone is ill prepared to face. Who or what are the Risen?
name: The Risen Chapter Two

description:
Chapter Two

When the top two contenders for the heavyweight championship can't find an unbiased referee for their match, they turn to that old standard-bearer of justice, Wyatt Earp! But their choice results in what's still regarded as one of the biggest scandals in sports history!
name: Chapter Two

volume.name: The Further Travels of Wyatt Earp

description:
'To Become a Monster' Conclusion

In the conclusion of 'To Become a Monster', Bobby's 'testing' advances to bloody new levels, and Freddie decides being ruthless will find his brother quicker than being righteous.
name: To Become A Monster Conclusion

description: In the GD Sourcebook tradition, we reveal the secrets and details of Gold Digger's fantastic array of gadgets, weaponry, vehicles, robots, and more...all told from the perspective of Gold Digger's foremost technology expert, Gina Diggers herself! This issue is devoted to the prototypes and works in progress of Gina's drawing board, from the elements of the GinaMobile-Alpha to the Gina Blaster-X gadgetry, from a third-gen Hurt-bot body design to new humanoid body plans for Peebo Scouts!

The Dark Queen has risen and she plans to lead the Dark Horde into war against those sworn to protect Earth. With a brilliant and manipulative plot to take control of the Nexus and the four realms of power that surround it, the queen is quickly gaining the ability to defeat almost anyone who stands in her way. And while humanity still has hope in the form of Sela Mathers and the Realm Knights, other unlikely heroes must join them before the Dark Queen becomes too powerful to stop.

This trade paperback collects the following: Grimm Fairy Tales presents: Inferno: Rings of Hell, Cinderella: Age of Darkness, and White Queen: Age of Darkness.
name: Volume Five

volume.name: Grimm Fairy Tales presents Age of Darkness

description:
Beatfighter: Part 2

The comedown is never easy, especially for Davron as he awakens to discover the hard truths of his everyday life are still there to greet him in the morning while Mason takes his first steps towards the life his brother always warned him about. See what's in store for the Oakes brothers in the second issue of our opening arc, "Beatfighter" part 2!! (It'll be glitzy and grimy, we promise!!)
name: Beatfighter Part 2

description:
Mark Twain’s retirement party turns deadly when the book golem William Wilde arrives. Meanwhile, Harry Houdini and Susan Lovecraft learn more than they should when they infiltrate one of Aleister Crowley’s séances.

Note: The digital edition (5/27/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Finger to the Bone Issue 2 of 3

description:
No Fun in This Funhouse of Doom

When the Snakatak bar starts turning people into zombies, Clea, Patti, Linus, and their chemistry teacher, Mr. Brimley, are trapped inside Yumzyland, the treat themed amusement park! The clueless Mayor Muffintop and nefarious Adam (Yummy's "Yes Man") are close to escape after leaving our heroes to certain doom! Clea discovers something new about the zombies predilections and puts herself in harms way! And she stop Adam in time?
name: No Fun in This Funhouse of Doom

description:
The Modern Dance

Joyce has a few too many and decides to have a night out on the town as Thrasher. Bad decisions ensue.
name: The Modern Dance

description:
Hangman

The long arm of the law is sometimes as slender as a rope around the neck! But though it falls to the judge to mete out punishment to those who break the law, who dispenses justice when the judge is corrupt? God?

Meet Karna in "Hangman", story by Chris Murrin; art by Dean Stahl with color by Mira Mortal! Inspired by Queen's unreleased song "Hangman", this is the fourteenth story in KILLER QUEEN, A COMIC ANTHOLOGY. The digital file also features more Queen-inspired BONUS ART from artist Jason Folkes!

A tribute to the greatest band in Rock-n-Royalty, KILLER QUEEN features twenty-seven works from over forty artists and writers, challenged to rock out to their favorite Queen track and use it as inspiration for an original short comic or vignette. Edited by Enrica Jang.
name: Hangman

description:
Re-born pt. 2

Black Moon leader, Laser has sent Rocket down to 2nd dimension Earth to begin the “new era” Meanwhile, at Coretech Stacy has a huge decision to make on her new young team. Was Rocket going to be stopped?
name: Re-born pt. 2

description: Jack's mastery of the Markings is growing. Will it be enough to defeat his enemy?

A Fall From Ashes-Part 3

The Mek Corps contemplates how to proceed now that they have succeeded in acquisition of the Infinite Energy Module
name: A Fall From Ashes, Part 3

description: The titanically tense buildup finally explodes! Can the White Bolt and the Parker boys stop Boss Frankie Parker before she sets the world on fire? Find out now, as Chris Sheridan brings his potboiling plot to a dynamite finale.
name: A Fiery Demise

description:
Shake A Leg

After Megalodon bit off Noah's leg it's up to Leon and Nessie to find Doctor P. before he kicks the bucket. Unfortunately Cthulhu and his army of spawn have taken control of Leon's Ark and their dysfunctional family fighting could spell doom for everyone!
name: Noah's Brother's Ark

description: Nowhere Man series closes out volume two with a heart-pounding, thrill ride. Fans of the series will get pulled deeper into the mysterious origins of Zade. As Rose Yancey tries to keep a low profile, she struggles to even keep it together. Jack Maguire continues to master his powers, and has proven that he can defeat a small army, but will he survive against an army of one?
name: Volume 2.3: Jacked Up

description: Gan's secret weighs heavy on him but a vision prompts him to visit an old and trusted friend who is just as likely to kill him as to help him.
50+ pages about hopelessness: 4 powerful stories & 3 terrific illustrations from the best new talent in comics. Plus unique interviews with Rachel Deering and Brett Uren.
name: Volume Two: Hopelessness

description: Red and the Wolfe separate to sojourn on their own paths. The Wolfe, mistakenly assuming himself prepared and stalwart enough to pass through the Forest of Ritual freely, is soon confronted with some truths about himself and his relationship with God. Red, meanwhile, is introduced to a portly gentlemen named Gigglehorn, who subsequently introduces her to his flesh-golem Churlish Joe.
name: Gigglehorn, Churlish Joe, and the Rapture of the Wolfe

description:
Resurrection

Three days after his death, Michael arises with no memory of who he is. Vivid flashbacks - part memory, part divine fantasy - begin to hint at his true identity and destiny.
name: Resurrection

description:
Busted

Jara Bint Rih got injured during World War 3 and spent the last three yeas of her life in search of a suit she hoped would restore her ability to walk. She and her best friend Lucia Mason found the suit when they were attacked by a gang. But Jara managed to fend the gang off by using the suit. She then went on a test run and promptly managed to get hunted by the police. Only a ruse helped her escape, not her powers. But her run in with the authorities twice in a few weeks has brought some attention to her...
name: Busted

description: After landing on an uncharted sand planet and battling with the local army, the "STARBURN" team faces an even greater threat from under the sand itself!! (Issue 2 of 4)
John and Monson struggle to get into Surran. Sarah has more upsetting news for John, and Mark rescues a Surranian woman with unforeseen consequences.

An Old Grudge

In the house of the infamous Windle Triplets: Alizon, Jennet and Jane, we learn of the relationship between Van, Pendle and the witches. Both past and present.
name: An Old Grudge

description:
Uncommon Tales

Sir Glen Douglas Rhodes, Scottish adventurer and antiquarian, is a haunted man. Each and every item in his strange collection has a story, but he feels he will not be at peace until he returns some of his museum pieces to their place of origin. And so Sir Glen embarks on a globe spanning journey, encountering ancient sea-monsters, demons, giants and the under in his quest to take these stories back home.
name: Uncommon Tales

description:
Escape from Hadegar

Trolik is trapped in the evil realm of Hadegar! He travels through the Realm of Hadegar to find a way to escape. He is joined by The King of Oskin and Trilos. Trolik faces many challenges in the realm of Hadegar!
name: Escape From Hadegar

description:
Though his past has long been a mystery, supernatural bounty hunter John Tower finally reveals the gruesome details of his former life with the only living soul he can trust: his unofficial partner, FBI agent Alicia Hardwicke.

Fighting together, they must retrieve three mystical artifacts - only then will Tower be freed from his wretched curse.

Tower goes to Hell!

In this issue, Tower and Alicia must descend into the depths of fear itself, venturing into a netherworld of torment and damnation. What awaits them down below? An unforgettable journey into darkness begins here!

"Sanctuary". The United States military decides to launch an offensive into the A Shau Valley near the Laotian border. This has been a long time staging area that the Viet Cong have used for years to send men and supplies into South Vietnam from the enemy’s sanctuary in Laos. Part 2 of 4.
name: Sanctuary

description:
It's here! All-New Digital-First Wahoo Morris!

Alicia goes beyond the mirror to come face to face with the apparition haunting her dreams. Bash attempts to make reparations only to get deeper into trouble with his friends.

WARRIOR AND DEFENDER

In the aftermath of the Korean Navy's victory at the Battle of Okpo, the Japanese invaders are now determined to assassinate Admiral Yi. One man claims he can get the job done. His name is Baron Seo.
name: Warrior and Defender

description:
Many years ago Tarot imprisoned and cut off the head of the Dark Elf Azure. Now he has escaped his cell, reattached his head and is looking for revenge. Meanwhile, Dark Magick grows inside Raven Hex as she examines Her Dress of Shadows and discovers its Black secrets. But there was a Terrible Price to pay.

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover AJim Balent1
BCover BJim Balent2
SEStudio Edition CoverJim Balent4
SESkyclad Edition "Virgin Art" CoverJim Balent2
name: The Dress of Shadows, Part One; School Bites: Professor Foxy Gardens

volume.name: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose

description: The second pic shows the actual size of the comic being less than an inch

person_credits.name: Colin Upton
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, cover, production

person_credits.name: Steve Willis
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

volume.name: Morty: The Dog Who Walks Like a Man

description:
Jim Hammond, the original Human Torch, has been driven mad by recent events - and now it's up to Namor to stop his rampage! And in England, Spitfire and Union Jack must face a different kind of Invader - one from another world! In 1917, several WWI heroes banded together to battle Martians - and now the invading aliens are back! As the Winter Soldier dispatches the all-new Invaders to help Spitfire, Tanalth the Pursuer seeks answers - and Toro emerges from his Inhuman cocoon with dangerous new powers! Can the all-new Captain America help him navigate his rebirth? Killraven, the Eternals and the Inhumans guest-star as the Invaders struggle to solve the mystery of the Martian invasion! Plus: The team faces Lash and a neo-Nazi threat, but what do they want with Toro and the Iron Cross?

Collects All-New Invaders #11-15.
name: Volume 3

volume.name: All-New Invaders: The Martians Are Coming

description: It's a perfect day for a picnic! Join Betty, Veronica and the gang for some snacks and sandwiches in the great outdoors! This is a digital-only collection, and the perfect reading material to bring along on YOUR picnic!

From the creators of Afterlife Inc. and 7STRING comes Big Punch Magazine, a quarterly magazine serialising four brand new series from the Big Punch Multiverse.

Issue 1 of BPM hits hard, introducing us to the worlds of Cuckoos, Orb, 99 Swords and The Wall with a punch to the face of concentrated awesome! A mysterious stone ship appears above an alternate New York; skilled catchers make gravity-defying leaps across the walled city of Prizm; a talking sword falls into the hands of Elsie Blackwood; and somewhere in the Extraverse, the crew of the Reflektor sail through stories not of their making.

Also featuring the triumphant return of Cat & Meringue!

Collected for the first time: three exciting alternate history graphic novel adventures exploring fantasy, magic, and martial arts in The Foreworld Saga! Including:

Suffrajitsu: Mrs. Pankhurst's Amazons #1-3:

London, 1914: The leaders of the radical women's rights movement are fugitives from the law. Their last line of defense is the secret society of "Amazons": women trained in the martial art of bartitsu and sworn to defend their leaders from arrest and assault.

After a series of daring escapes and battles with the police, the stakes rise dramatically when the Amazons are forced into a deadly game of cat and mouse against an aristocratic, utopian cult...

The Dead God #1-3:

In the year 536 AD, the land of Frisia is a hostile place of swords and sorcery. Across the dark, cold countryside, three valiant warriors quest for a treasure, the likes of which few can comprehend. These three-the mighty grappler, Eadhild; the skilled archer, Coll; and the charming young Valens-are searching for the head of Yvrnn, the sky-god. For, according to legend, the head of Yvrnn will grant its possessors great wisdom and fortune.

The trio's quest won't be easy, as they must not only contend with Yvrnn's followers who have set obstacles in their paths, but also the mystical creatures and bandits that haunt the roads of Frisia.

Symposium #1-3:

The Shield-Brethren is a secret martial order that has defended the West for centuries. Now, the origins of the order are revealed in this stunning three-issue tale.

Our heroes, seeking to realize the idea offered to them by the philosopher Plato, leave Athens and travel to Delphi with hope of visiting the oracle. They have a dream to found a city of their own, and they desire insight from the oracle as to their question. But their skills-both as warriors and as thinking men-will be tested by adversaries they do not even know they have.

This collection contains explicit material and is intended for mature audiences.
name: GN

volume.name: Blood and Honor: The Foreworld Saga Graphic Novels

description:
Prom Night

Marty Jones, a member of the Baltimore Police Department, learns all-too-quickly that wearing a badge sometimes isn't enough. Haunted by a traumatic event, she now tries to bestow justice in her own way and settle old scores.

This is the first issue of a story about morals, fear, overcoming trauma and about the ability (or lack thereof) of escaping inner-demons.
name: Prom Night

description:
The first hardcover collection of the Twelfth Doctor series!

On the terraformed ice planet of Isen IV, the Doctor and Clara discover a monstrous Hyperion has been awakened at the planet's core. Can they halt the rampage of a living star, in the middle of the celebrity wedding of the century, before it escapes to conquer the galaxy?

And when Clara and the Doctor land in India, a conspiracy hundreds of years in the making comes to light! The Thuggee cult of Kali is trying to resurrect one of the most deadly aliens yet known... Split across two time zones, our heroes must stop Kali's return at all costs – with the help of Rani Jhulka, 'the renegade Amazon' in the 1820s, and Priyanka Maratha, daughter of one of the Doctor's oldest friends, in the Mumbai of 2314!

To find out just what makes Peter Capaldi's incarnation of the Doctor so intoxicating, get on board now!

Collects The Twelfth Doctor #1-5

Note: The digital edition (5/27/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
name: Volume 1

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Twelfth Doctor - Terrorformer

description:
Celebrate the birthday of the book that made a Giant-Size impact on comics! Revisit the fateful day that Professor X gathered an all-new, all-different, multinational mix of mutants - as Storm, Nightcrawler, Colossus, Banshee, Sunfire, Thunderbird and some guy named Wolverine unite with Cyclops in the rescue tale that ushered in four decades of uncanny adventures! See how the original team reacted to the newly expanded roster! Learn the tragic histories of Colossus and Wolverine! Ask yourself "What If?" they all died or never even met! And savor the explosive epic that revealed the group's true deadly genesis and the ill-fated existence of a previous team!

Collects Giant-Size X-Men #1, 3-4; Classic X-Men #1; X-Men Origins: Colossus; X-Men Origins: Wolverine; X-Men: Deadly Genesis #1-6; What If? (1989) #9, 23; material from X-Men Gold #1.
name: HC

description:
Inkpot Award-winner Fred Perry presents a boisterous, bouncing tribute to the work of Heavy Metal artist Richard Corben! In the midst of one of her adventures, Gina Diggers finds herself abruptly transported to the surface of an alternate version of Mars. The interdimensional shift leaves her extra-buff...but also in the buff! Left in her birthday suit, with only her newfound muscle and her mighty mentality at hand, Gina must make her way across an angry red planet...alone!

This graphic novel is slightly more adult-themed (mostly just exposed bodies) than typical for Gold Digger. Initially only available through a Kickstarter campaign instead of from Antarctic Press.
name: GN

description: Facing certain annihilation, the kingdom of Carnasus sends a group of unlikely adventurers on an impossible quest – to kill the king of their enemy. Alone, expendable, and led by a man they do not trust, they must travel halfway across the realm to meet the enemy who marches to destroy them.
name: Chapter 1

description:
GUITAR PHANTASY is a classic (rock) story:

boy meets guitar; boy fights demons.

This vibrant fantasy from Timothy Bach (Gargoyle By Moonlight) and Carl Peterson (MAD Magazine) is a rock'n'roll fairy tale mashup of Scott Pilgrim and Lord of the Rings.

Guided by the odd little shopkeeper of a second-hand music store, Kev discovers an incredible guitar and uncovers the power of music and the untapped force inside of himself. But when the devourer of all things, a wicked-looking, music-hating demon appears, can Kev play fast enough, hard enough to defeat the demon?

With colors by Robt Snyder, letters by E.T. Dollman, and a cover from Silvio dB.

Dana and Adam are constantly at each other at Donovan and Lewis Design Studio, but with him being a ladies' man and her a single mother, it's to be expected. When Adam offers to be Dana's date to a reunion to show up her ex and the father of her daughter, a night of work becomes dangerously mixed with pleasure. Soon, the pair bounce from bickering at each other to Adam helping out Dana, whether it be fixing her roof or fixing her heart. Why are they so sweet together now? Could it be because of her unexpected baby?
name: Vol. 1
